title: (x) "National Plasterers Council" logo - ITC Kabel {Marc O, Rainer}
author: bessd1

comments.content:
Tough to tell from this graphic. But judging by the version on their web site ( [http://www.npconline.org/mc/page.do](http://web.archive.org/web/20070402195259/http:/www.npconline.org/mc/page.do)), it looks like ITC Kabel Ultra

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-kabel/ultra/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070402195259/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-kabel/ultra/)

Hmm, hard to tell from this sample, but some “details” remind me of [Kabel Ultra](http://web.archive.org/web/20070402195259/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-kabel/ultra/).

EDIT: Ha, same minute. Well, just wanted to link to fontshop.com. Is it possible that fontshop has NO (in words zero) kabel-typefaces available? Well, at least when I search for “kabel” the search brings nothing, nichts, nada, rien. For me. Hmm. Can’t believe that. What did I do wrong?

EDIT2: Hmm, seems I have difficulties to search at fontshop.com. Is that just me? At [fontshop.at](http://web.archive.org/web/20070402195259/http:/www.fontshop.at/fontdetailc.php3?ns=&sns=&co=&co2=&id=fp-C68-g0102) everything’s fine, but no wonder different site …
Renko - Searches from German IPs are currently failing. We’re working on the issue.
